attributes.action: change the law to allow a person to defend themselves in their own home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: change the law to allow a person to defend themselves in their own home with any possible means should an intruder break in without being prosecuted for defending themselves.  Intruders should have no rights if in someone else's property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
